instructions: This sheet is designed for use in Roll20. It is based on the Warhammer 40000: Only War ttrpg by Fantasy Flight Games, and derived from the Halo Mythic 3.5 Roll20 sheet made by Omran Losinno and Michael van Weelde.Infographic has information about Wounds, Fatigue, and Fate Pts. If this information is invisible when the sheet is first loaded, try clicking the Infographic button twice.To GM toggles a whisper function. If enabled, all rolls will only be visible to you and the GM.Inline Mod toggles a query for situational modifiers. For example, a Dodge check in thick mud carries a -30 penalty, which would be noted in the Inline Mod. In situations where many checks are made with no modifier, leaving this option disabled may streamline gameplay.Words or symbols in the sheet that don't make sense might have a tooltip explaining their function if hovered over.If you have any questions about the sheet or feedback, please feel free to PM the author at https://app.roll20.net/users/685637/sammy-silver Disclaimer: I've been out of the game for several years due to life changes, so I may not be able to implement feature changes.Currently reported issues:>Setting a weapon as Unreliable causes the Unreliable flag to proc on a 90 roll instead of a 91.>A Plasma weapon set to Maximal correctly increases Damage by 1d10, but does not modify Penetration values.>When a character is Encumbered, they incorrectly take a -10 penalty to AGI-based Operate checks.>Psionics casting: When a Psyker Sustains spells, the EPR ticker drops EPR by 1 when Sustaining a single spell. It should drop by 0 for only this first spell. For more than one spell, the sheet logic correctly counts -1 for each spell Sustained.
